page.title: 11BRYN-TYPICAL FAMILY LIFE.
page.content: FAMILY LIFE OF ADAMS FAMILY OF BRYN. LIVE AT 17,VARTEG ROW,BRYN,PORT TALBOT A DETACHED HOUSE IN A PRETTY LOCATION. MICHAEL ADAMS,MECHANICAL ENGINEER,B.P. LLANDARCY,42 .EVELYN ADAMS,HOUSEWIFE, 38.IEUAN ADAMS,BRYNPRIMARY,9.0.GARETH ADAMS,BRYNPRIMARY,7.6.HUW ADAMS,BRYN NURSERY,3.5.NO PETS. {TYPICAL DAY: TEASMAID WAKES US AT 6.30.WE HAVE BREAKFAST AN D MIKE GOES TO WORK.I WAKE THE BOYS AT 7.30.THEY HAVE TOAST, FRUIT JUICE AND CEREAL FOR BREAKFAST. GET BOYS DRESSED FOR SCHOOL.WALK THEM UP THE HILL AT 8.45.COME HOME AND DO ANY HOUSEWORK THAT IS NEEDED.COLLECT HUW AT 11.30,COME HOME HAVE DINNER,BEA -NS ON TOAST.BOYS HAVE SCHOOL DINNERS. HUW PLAYS WITH TOYS WHILE I FINISH HOU SE WORK.WALK UP WITH HUW TO GET BOYS AT 3.30.COME HOME,BOYS CHANGE FROM UNI FORM,GO OUT TO PLAY.
